name: allow_EBR_Section
action: <*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion Server),Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F),Number of Network Storage Device - Standard(0-100),Header_11_open,Header_11_close)*><*SETREQUIRED(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion Server),Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F),Number of Network Storage Device - Standard(0-100))*>
